title: WCAS GNDR_ST 341-0-20 Transnational Perspectives on Gender and Sexuality

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: From Beyonce's "Formation" to Sheryl Sandberg's Lean In, formations of motherhood in the media have proliferated in the last decade. This course investigates the way young women in the U.S. are being positioned by various media to understand motherhood in the age of neoliberalism and the way women have used media to shape, resist, and/or conform to these models.

subject: GNDR_ST
